name: Barkcheology
description:
Welcome to barkcheology!

You are a treasure hunter, spelunking your way through multiple worlds in order to gain great riches! Solve puzzles, grab all the gems you can get, and hopefully complete the game!

There are two game modes:

Arcade: You go through each area, and solve every puzzle difficulty once. A fun challenge!

Adventure: You explore a maze-like map, find shiny rocks, as you attempt to afford proper equipment, to reach the end of the game.

Good luck!
